content.body: I'm also *very* surprised to see a completely different approach dropped immediately prior to the meeting.

content.body: I'm also *consistently* bewildered at all these comments about this being strange and unfamiliar, when the majority of the proposal's syntax is pretty much exactly in line with how every pattern matching syntax I'm aware of works. (Haskell and Python, at minimum.)

content.body: It's fairly similar to Rust's, as well (tho Rust focuses more on Enum unapplication rather than having a default "list" and "object" to rely on, but it's otherwise very similar)
